verses.verse: Syng you vnto God a newe song: sing ye vnto God all [that be in] the earth.
Syng ye vnto God and blesse his name: set foorth in wordes from day to day his saluation.
Declare his glory amongst the heathen: and his wonderous actes amongst all the people.
For God is great and worthy of all prayse: he is more to be feared then all gods.
As for all the gods of the heathen they be but idoles: and it is God that made the heauens.
Honour and maiestie be before hym: power and excellentnesse be in his sanctuarie.
Geue vnto God O ye families of the people: geue vnto God glorie & power.
Geue vnto God glorie [due] vnto his name: bryng an offeryng, and come into his courtes.
Worshyp you God in the maiestie of holynesse: be you in dread of his face all [that be in] the earth.
Set it foorth in wordes among the heathen that God raigneth: and that the worlde is set of a sure foundation, it shall not be remoued, he wyll iudge the people accordyng to equitie.
The heauens shall reioyce, and the earth be glad: the sea shall make a noyse and all that is therin.
The fielde shalbe ioyfull and all that is in it: then shall all the trees of the wood reioyce before the face of God.
For he commeth, for he commeth to iudge the earth: he will iudge the world accordyng to iustice, and the people accordyng to his trueth.
